text: Linda Kay Pennell Johnson (May 2, 1945 â€“ February 18, 2020) was an American politician. She was a Republican. She served as a member of the North Carolina House of Representatives from 2001 until her death in 2020. She represented North Carolina's 74th, 82nd, 83rd and 90th districts during her term. Outside of politics, she was a computer analyst and tax accountant. Johnson died of a stroke while battling cancer on February 18, 2020. She was 74. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Linda P. Johnson
